name: smart-table-football
description: Smart Table Football - App for those who want improves their games experience
author: jozwiak <kubencki@gmail.com>

scripts.start: if [ -n "$START_API" ]; then cd stf-api && echo api && yarn start; elif [ -n "$START_ADMIN" ]; then cd stf-admin && echo admin && yarn start; else cd stf-player && echo player && yarn start; fi
scripts.electron:pack:mac: yarn electron:clean && yarn electron:prepack && electron-builder --mac && yarn electron:clean:build
scripts.electron:pack:win: yarn electron:clean && yarn electron:prepack && electron-builder --win && yarn electron:clean:build
scripts.electron:pack:linux: yarn electron:clean && yarn electron:prepack && electron-builder --linux && yarn electron:clean:build
scripts.electron:pack:all: yarn electron:clean yarn electron:prepack && electron-builder -mwl && yarn electron:clean:build
